title: How do I upgrade my subscription Tier?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I would like to upgrade my subscription tier
  • I own a subscription license, but want to upgrade to a higher tier

sections.title: CauseÂ
content: You may wish to upgrade to have greater access to the Services, or due to meeting the revenue cap on your current tier.

sections.title: Resolution
content: To upgrade a current subscription plan, please follow the steps below:

• First log into your Unity Account at the Unity website.
  • Once logged in your account, click the 'Organizations' tab on the left hand side of the screen.
  • Once in the Organization that owns the subscription you wish to upgrade, under the 'Subscriptions' box, click 'Manage' (the cog icon). You will then see a green box saying 'Upgrade Plan'.
  • You will be then taken to a page with the packages/models available for you to upgrade to.

sections.title: More Information
content: You cannot downgrade to a lower tier package until you have finished the 12 month commitment period of your current subscription.
